work_completed.title: AI Democratic Governance and Voting System
deliverables: 12 REST API endpoints for governance in server.py
features: Proposal lifecycle: DRAFT → DELIBERATION → VOTING → DECIDED → ENACTED
5 proposal types with configurable rules (code_change, policy_change, resource_allocation, membership, standard_amendment)
Query API: list, filter, voter history, stats

work_completed.title: Trusted Autonomy Security Layer
deliverables: security.py — full security module (KeyManager, ActionSigner, ContextIsolator, TrustChain)
10 REST API endpoints for security in server.py
Swarm integration: key persistence, health check, status report
features: Per-entity HMAC-SHA256 key generation, rotation, and revocation
Cryptographic action signing with tamper detection
Signature verification with key lifecycle awareness (active/rotated/revoked)
Context isolation for untrusted external content
End-to-end trust chain verification (action → signature → key → entity → permission)
